ComicInfo.Title: Mega-City Manhunt, Part 1: The Most Despised Face of the 22nd Century
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dredd has defeated the Dark Judges and broken out of Sector One… only to find himself a fugitive in Judge Cal’s insane surveillance state, with only Anderson in his head helping him survive Cal’s rabid manhunt…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Torres | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Artist's Edition Cover | Mark Torres | 2 | Sub | Subscription Sketch Cover | None | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-07 09:19:13. [CVDB471341]
ComicInfo.Inker: Karl Waller, Steve Scott, Steve Scott
ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Dubbie Cruz, Judge Anderson, Judge Dredd
ComicInfo.Teams: Judges of Mega-City One, Special Judicial Squad
